ModMetaData.name: Orbital Book Merchants
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds an orbital book merchant who travel all over in search of knowledge to store and sell. This orbital trader sells a large numbers of books along with a few techprints, and have the silver to buy any books you're willing to sell.
For those who want more specific details, they sell 5 techprints along with 5-10 of each category of book (text book, scematic, novel, and tome (if you have Anomaly)).
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
